Docs.param: The host part of the authority to match. May start with a single '*' to wildcard the front of the host name.
Optional port part of the authority to match. If null, any port is allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddDataPath (string path, Android.OS.Pattern type);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddDataPath(string path, valuetype Android.OS.Pattern type) cil managed

Docs.param: Either a raw string that must exactly match the file path, or a simple pattern, depending on type.

Determines how path will be compared to determine a match: either Android.OS.PatternMatcher.PATTERN_LITERAL, Android.OS.PatternMatcher.PATTERN_PREFIX, or Android.OS.PatternMatcher.PATTERN_SIMPLE_GLOB.
Docs.summary: Add a new Intent data path to match against.

Docs.param: The action to look for.
Docs.summary: Is the given action included in the filter? Note that if the filter does not include any actions, false will always be returned.
Docs.returns: True if the action is explicitly mentioned in the filter.

MemberSignature.Value: public Android.Content.MatchResults Match (Android.Content.ContentResolver resolver, Android.Content.Intent intent, bool resolve, string logTag);

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype Android.Content.MatchResults Match(class Android.Content.ContentResolver resolver, class Android.Content.Intent intent, bool resolve, string logTag) cil managed
member this.Match : Android.Content.ContentResolver * Android.Content.Intent * bool * string -> Android.Content.MatchResults

Docs.param: To be added.
The Intent to compare against.
If true, the intent's type will be resolved by calling Intent.resolveType(); otherwise a simple match against Intent.type will be performed.
Tag to use in debugging messages.
Docs.summary: Test whether this filter matches the given <var>intent</var>.
Docs.returns: Returns either a valid match constant (a combination of #MATCH_CATEGORY_MASK and #MATCH_ADJUSTMENT_MASK), or one of the error codes #NO_MATCH_TYPE if the type didn't match, #NO_MATCH_DATA if the scheme/path didn't match, #NO_MATCH_ACTION if the action didn't match, or #NO_MATCH_CATEGORY if one or more categories didn't match.

format.a: Java documentation for android.content.IntentFilter.match(android.content.ContentResolver, android.content.Intent, boolean, java.lang.String).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string MatchCategories(class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<string> categories) cil managed

Docs.param: The categories included in the intent, as returned by Intent.getCategories().
Docs.summary: Match this filter against an Intent's categories.
Docs.returns: If all categories match (success), null; else the name of the first category that didn't match.

MemberSignature.Value: public Android.Content.MatchResults MatchData (string type, string scheme, Android.Net.Uri data);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype Android.Content.MatchResults MatchData(string type, string scheme, class Android.Net.Uri data) cil managed
member this.MatchData : string * string * Android.Net.Uri -> Android.Content.MatchResults

Docs.param: The desired data type to look for, as returned by Intent.resolveType().
The desired data scheme to look for, as returned by Intent.getScheme().
The full data string to match against, as supplied in Intent.data.
Docs.summary: Match this filter against an Intent's data (type, scheme and path).
Docs.returns: Returns either a valid match constant (a combination of #MATCH_CATEGORY_MASK and #MATCH_ADJUSTMENT_MASK), or one of the error codes #NO_MATCH_TYPE if the type didn't match or #NO_MATCH_DATA if the scheme/path didn't match.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.IntentFilterPriority SystemHighPriority = (1000)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.IntentFilterPriority enum directly instead of this field.", true)
